name: grab-rescue
description: This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with HMR and some ESLint rules.

scripts.dev: npm install && concurrently "cd backend && npm install && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev"
scripts.host: npm install && concurrently "cd backend && npm install && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm install && npm run host"
